projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Create a modern portfolio website to showcase your projects, skills, and experience. Include sections for about, projects, skills, and contact information.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Build a task management application with features like creating, editing, and deleting tasks, setting due dates, and organizing tasks into categories.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Develop a weather dashboard that displays current weather conditions, forecasts, and historical data for multiple locations.

projects.title: Recipe Finder

projects.description: Build a personal finance application to track income, expenses, and savings goals with visualizations and reports.

projects.description: Develop a dashboard that aggregates content from multiple social media platforms and displays analytics.

projects.description: Build an application to track workouts, set fitness goals, and monitor progress with charts and statistics.

projects.title: Language Learning App
projects.description: Develop an interactive language learning application with flashcards, quizzes, and progress tracking.

projects.title: Smart Home Dashboard
projects.description: Create a dashboard to control and monitor smart home devices with real-time status updates and automation rules.
